Move towards the closest target and launch a series of attacks using <color=#3487e0>[War Scythe]</color> and <color=#3487e0>[Cannon]</color>. Each time the attack fails, use <color=#3487e0>Malicious Outburst</color> once.

For each Phase weakness obtained this way, damage dealt is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>20%</color>, up to a maximum reduction of <color=#f26c1c>80%</color>.

<color=#f26c1c>60%-100%</color>: <color=#f26c1c>200%</color> of attack.

When stability index is greater than <color=#f26c1c>0</color>, this unit additionally deals <color=#f26c1c>2 points</color> of stability damage when attacking enemy targets.
Stability Break lasts for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color>. Unable to receive stability restoration effects during Stability Break. Restores stability index to full <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color> after Stability Break.
data.descriptionBrief: When stability index is greater than <color=#f26c1c>0</color>, this unit deals additional stability damage when attacking enemy targets. Unable to receive stability restoration effects during Stability Break. Restores stability index to full <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color> after Stability Break.

data.name: Long-range Targeting
data.description: Selects 1 enemy target and deals physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>100%</color> of attack. For every <color=#f26c1c>1 tile</color> of distance between the user and the enemy target, damage is increased by <color=#f26c1c>3%</color>.
data.descriptionBrief: Deals physical damage. The further the distance between the user and enemy target, the higher the damage dealt.

data.name: Sector Scan
data.description: Selects the direction of the nearest enemy target and deals AoE physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>100%</color> of attack to all enemies within a <color=#f26c1c>4 tile cone-shaped area ahead</color>.
data.descriptionBrief: Selects the direction of the nearest enemy target and deals AoE Physical damage to all enemies within a <color=#f26c1c>4 tile cone-shaped area ahead</color>.

data.name: Mobile Fortress
data.description:
Summons <color=#f26c1c>1</color> Fortress Device at a random location within <color=#f26c1c>6 to 8 tiles</color> around self. At the start of the turn, gains <color=#f26c1c>1 stack</color> of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> for each Fortress Device on the field for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color>.
Fortress Device: Cannot move, initial stability is <color=#f26c1c>0</color>.
Fortress Device Trait: When attacked, increases damage taken by <color=#f26c1c>10%</color> for <color=#f26c1c>each tile</color> of distance from the enemy target, up to a maximum of <color=#f26c1c>70%</color>.

data.name: Shield Building
data.description:
Generates a shield for the user equal to <color=#f26c1c>20%</color> of Fortress Titan's max HP. If the shield is still active at the start of the next turn, it will explode, dealing AoE damage that ignores Cover to all targets on the battlefield based on remaining shield amount.
Shield remaining corresponds to the shield explosion damage multiplier:
<color=#f26c1c>60%-100%</color>: <color=#f26c1c>200%</color> of attack.
<color=#f26c1c>30%-60%</color>: <color=#f26c1c>140%</color> of attack.
Below <color=#f26c1c>30%</color>: <color=#f26c1c>80%</color> of attack.
data.descriptionBrief: Generates a shield for the user. If the shield is still active at the start of the next turn, it will explode, dealing AoE damage that ignores Cover to all targets on the battlefield based on remaining shield amount.

data.name: Close-Range Advantage
data.description:

<color=#f26c1c>1 to 3 tiles</color>: Damage taken is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>40%</color>
<color=#f26c1c>4 to 7 tiles</color>: Damage taken is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>20%</color>

data.name: Prayer Ceremony
data.description:
Summon multiple <color=#3487e0>Salute Cannons</color> at fixed positions on the battlefield for <color=#f26c1c>1</color> turn. At the start of the next enemy turn, if <color=#3487e0>Salute Cannons</color> are not destroyed, they will self-destruct.

<color=#3487e0>Prosperity Cannon</color>: Restore stability index to Eber when spawned. After self-destructing, increase damage and stability damage dealt by Eber.
<color=#3487e0>Cleansing Cannon</color>: Reduce damage taken by Eber. After self-destructing, deal AoE damage to the closest enemy target.
<color=#3487e0>Purification Cannon</color>: Allow Eber to <color=#3487e0>Counterattack</color>. After self-destructing, cleanse all buffs from all enemy units.
<color=#3487e0>Startling Cannon</color>: When spawned, randomly apply <color=#3487e0>Damp</color> and <color=#3487e0>Monoprotic Acid</color> to enemy targets. After self-destructing, deal physical damage and stability damage to the enemy target with the highest mobility.

Select a tile in a <color=#f26c1c>cross-shaped area within 7 tiles</color>, move to that tile and deal melee physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>180%</color> of attack to the enemy target with the highest HP within <color=#f26c1c>1 tile</color>.
For every <color=#f26c1c>2%</color> of the enemy target's missing HP, increase self attack by <color=#f26c1c>1%</color> for this skill. If this kills the target, increase damage dealt by the next active attack by <color=#f26c1c>30%</color>.
Consume all stacks of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>, for <color=#f26c1c>each stack</color> consumed, increase damage dealt by this attack by <color=#f26c1c>10%</color>, up to a <color=#f26c1c>60%</color> increase. If there are <color=#f26c1c>2 stacks</color> of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> or more, gain <color=#f26c1c>1 stack</color> of <color=#3487e0>{1}</color> for <color=#f26c1c>1 turn</color>.
data.descriptionBrief: Deal melee physical damage to the enemy target with the highest HP within <color=#f26c1c>1 tile</color>. If there are <color=#f26c1c>2 stacks</color> of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> or more, gain <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>. Increase self attack for this skill based on the enemy target's missing HP. If this kills the target, increase damage dealt by the next active attack.
data.descriptionLiterary: For everyone's safety, the invaders must be silenced forever.

After using <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>, consumes all stacks of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> from the target, and Robella gains an equal number of stacks of <color=#3487e0>{2}</color>. 
When Robella has <color=#f26c1c>more than 2 stacks</color> of <color=#3487e0>{2}</color>, the damage dealt by her basic attacks is converted to <color=#42cce0>Freeze Damage</color>, and critical rate is increased by <color=#f26c1c>20%</color>.
When Robella has <color=#f26c1c>more than 5 stacks</color> of <color=#3487e0>{2}</color>, critical damage is increased by <color=#f26c1c>30%</color>, and the damage dealt by <color=#3487e0>{1}</color> is increased by <color=#f26c1c>30%</color>.

data.name: Counter Armor
data.description:
When entering the battlefield, the Flareberus enters <color=#3487e0>Armor Mode</color>, gaining the <color=#3487e0>Armor Mode</color> skillset. This mode provides superior defense capabilities. When it enters Stability Break, it switches to <color=#3487e0>Flare Mode</color>, replacing all of its defensive skills with powerful melee attacks. Once the Flareberus goes into Stability Break, it will never regain stability.

When the Flareberus' stability is greater than <color=#f26c1c>0</color>, damage taken is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>80%</color>, stability damage taken is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>4 points</color> (fixed stability damage caused by exploiting weakness etc. is not affected), and mobility is increased by <color=#f26c1c>2 tiles</color>. At the end of the action, gains <color=#f26c1c>1 stack</color> of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>, and <color=#f26c1c>1 stack</color> of <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>. <color=#3487e0>{1}</color> lasts only until the start of the next turn (Flaberus' side).
At the start of the turn (Flareberus' side), removes all of Flareberus' debuffs.
When entering Stability Break, immediately performs the final <color=#3487e0>Cerberus Attack</color>.
data.descriptionBrief:
When entering the battlefield, the Flareberus enters <color=#3487e0>Armor Mode</color>, gaining the <color=#3487e0>Armor Mode</color> skillset. This mode provides superior defense capabilities. When it enters Stability Break, it switches to <color=#3487e0>Flare Mode</color>, replacing all of its defensive skills with powerful melee attacks. Once the Flareberus enters Stability Break, it will never regain stability.

When the Flareberus' stability is greater than <color=#f26c1c>0</color>, it reduces damage and stability damage taken, and increases its mobility. At the end of the action, it gains <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> and <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>.
At the start of the turn (Flareberus' side), removes all of Flareberus' debuffs.
When entering Stability Break, immediately performs the final <color=#3487e0>Cerberus Attack</color>.

data.name: Data Crush
data.description: Selects the enemy target with the highest attack in the <color=#f26c1c>entire battlefield</color>, dealing AoE Physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>80%</color> of attack to it and all enemy targets within <color=#f26c1c>2 tiles</color>, and applies <color=#f26c1c>2 stacks</color> of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>.

data.name: Mopro Bomb
data.description:
Selects the target with the highest HP <color=#f26c1c>in the battlefield</color>, dealing AoE Physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>80%</color> of attack to it and all enemies within <color=#f26c1c>3 tiles</color> of it, and deals AoE Physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>50%</color> of attack to it and all enemies within <color=#f26c1c>5 tiles</color> of it. This damage can be shared and after this skill is used, cleanses all stacks of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> on the enemy targets. 
If this attack does not hit any enemy targets, or it hits an enemy without <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>, gains <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>.
data.descriptionBrief:
Deals AoE Physical damage to the enemy with the highest HP and all enemies within <color=#f26c1c>3 tiles</color> of it, and deals AoE Physical damage to all enemies within <color=#f26c1c>5 tiles</color> of the target. The damage from both instances can be shared. Cleanses all stacks of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> on enemies hit. 
If this attack does not hit any enemy targets, or it hits an enemy without <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>, gains <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>.
